caption: Session
description: The Session object describes details about an authenticated session. e.g. Session Creation Time, Session Issuer. Defined by D3FEND d3f:Session.
name: session

created_time.description: The time when the session was created.

issuer.description: The identifier of the session issuer.

uid.description: The unique identifier of the session.

uuid.description: The universally unique identifier of the session.
